>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/nationalities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of all available nationalities (49) and nationality groups (8) along with the amount of samples we have of them in our dataset.

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully retrieved nationalities","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Schema of the /nationalities response ","example":{"nationalities":{"british":6134933,"indian":90347,"norwegian":23920},"nationalitiyGroups":{"african":104673,"angloAmerican":112722,"eastAsian":631015}},"properties":{"nationalities":{"additionalProperties":{"type":"integer"},"title":"Nationalities","type":"object"},"nationalityGroups":{"additionalProperties":{"type":"integer"},"title":"Nationalitygroups","type":"object"}},"required":["nationalities","nationalityGroups"],"title":"NationalitiesSchema","type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
